mapper.select: SELECT l."LCTR_START_DATE", lv."CONTS_ID", l."LCTR_CNTSCHD", lv."VIEWING_PERIOD", CASE WHEN lv."LCTR_NO" = 1 THEN l."LCTR_START_DATE" WHEN lv."LCTR_NO" IS NULL THEN l."LCTR_START_DATE" ELSE lv_prev."VIEWING_PERIOD" END AS "befor_period", CASE WHEN s."LCTR_NO" IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE s."LCTR_NO"+1 END AS "LCTR_NO", l."LCTR_ID" FROM ( SELECT * FROM "SYLLABUS" WHERE "LCTR_NO" > 0 ) s JOIN "LECTURE" l ON s."LCTR_ID" = l."LCTR_ID" LEFT JOIN "LECTURE_VIDEO" lv ON s."CONTS_ID" = lv."CONTS_ID" LEFT JOIN "LECTURE_VIDEO" lv_prev ON lv."LCTR_NO" = lv_prev."LCTR_NO" + 1 AND lv."LCTR_ID" = lv_prev."LCTR_ID" WHERE l."LCTR_ID" = #{lctr_id} AND s."CONTS_ID" IS NOT NULL ORDER BY s."LCTR_NO" DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT l."LCTR_START_DATE", lv."CONTS_ID", l."LCTR_CNTSCHD", CASE WHEN lv."LCTR_NO" = 1 THEN l."LCTR_START_DATE" WHEN lv."LCTR_NO" IS NULL THEN l."LCTR_START_DATE" ELSE lv_prev."VIEWING_PERIOD" END AS "VIEWING_PERIOD", CASE WHEN s."LCTR_NO" IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE s."LCTR_NO" END AS "LCTR_NO", l."LCTR_ID" FROM ( SELECT * FROM "SYLLABUS" WHERE "LCTR_NO" > 0 ) s JOIN "LECTURE" l ON s."LCTR_ID" = l."LCTR_ID" LEFT JOIN "LECTURE_VIDEO" lv ON s."CONTS_ID" = lv."CONTS_ID" LEFT JOIN "LECTURE_VIDEO" lv_prev ON lv."LCTR_NO" = lv_prev."LCTR_NO" + 1 AND lv."LCTR_ID" = lv_prev."LCTR_ID" WHERE l."LCTR_ID" = #{lctr_id} AND s."CONTS_ID" IS NULL ORDER BY s."LCTR_NO" LIMIT 1

SELECT DISTINCT ON (lv."LCTR_NO") c.*, u.*, l.*, s.*, lv.*, cs."CONTS_ID", cs."LCTR_ID", cs."LCTR_NO", cs."USER_SEQ", cs."CONTS_MAX", TO_CHAR(lv."VIEWING_PERIOD"::DATE - INTERVAL '7 days', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "befor_period", CASE WHEN TO_DATE(lv."VIEWING_PERIOD", 'YYYY-MM-DD') < CURRENT_DATE THEN CASE WHEN cs."CONTS_PRGRT" = 100 THEN '출석' ELSE '결석' END WHEN TO_DATE(lv."VIEWING_PERIOD", 'YYYY-MM-DD') > CURRENT_DATE THEN CASE WHEN cs."CONTS_PRGRT" = 100 THEN '출석' ELSE '미수강' END ELSE '결석' END AS "VIEW_STATUS" FROM "COURSE_REGISTRATION" c JOIN "USER_INFO" u ON c."USER_SEQ" = u."USER_SEQ" JOIN "LECTURE" l ON c."LCTR_ID" = l."LCTR_ID" JOIN ( SELECT * FROM "SYLLABUS" WHERE "LCTR_NO" > 0 ) s ON l."LCTR_ID" = s."LCTR_ID" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM "CLASS_SCHEDULE" WHERE "USER_SEQ" = #{user_seq} AND "LCTR_ID" = #{lctr_id} ) cs ON s."LCTR_NO" = cs."LCTR_NO" AND cs."USER_SEQ" = #{user_seq} LEFT JOIN "LECTURE_VIDEO" lv ON s."CONTS_ID" = lv."CONTS_ID" WHERE c."USER_SEQ" = #{user_seq} AND l."LCTR_ID" = #{lctr_id} AND lv."CONTS_ID" IS NOT NULL ORDER BY lv."LCTR_NO", c."USER_SEQ";

SELECT DISTINCT ON (lv."LCTR_NO") u.*, l.*, s.*, lv.*, TO_CHAR(lv."VIEWING_PERIOD"::DATE - INTERVAL '7 days', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "befor_period" FROM "USER_INFO" u JOIN "LECTURE" l ON u."USER_SEQ" = l."USER_SEQ" JOIN "SYLLABUS" s ON s."LCTR_ID" = l."LCTR_ID" JOIN "LECTURE_VIDEO" lv ON s."CONTS_ID" = lv."CONTS_ID" WHERE l."LCTR_ID" = #{lctr_id} AND u."USER_SEQ" = #{user_seq}
SELECT u."USER_NAME", l."LCTR_NAME" FROM "USER_INFO" u JOIN "LECTURE" l ON u."USER_SEQ" = l."USER_SEQ" WHERE l."LCTR_ID" = #{lctr_id}

SELECT DISTINCT ON (lv."LCTR_NO") u."USER_NAME", l.*, s.*, lv.*, f.*, TO_CHAR(lv."VIEWING_PERIOD"::DATE - INTERVAL '7 days', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "befor_period" FROM "USER_INFO" u JOIN "LECTURE" l ON u."USER_SEQ" = l."USER_SEQ" JOIN "SYLLABUS" s ON s."LCTR_ID" = l."LCTR_ID" JOIN "LECTURE_VIDEO" lv ON s."CONTS_ID" = lv."CONTS_ID" LEFT JOIN "FILE_GROUP" f ON lv."FILE_GROUP" = f."FILE_GROUP" WHERE s."CONTS_ID" = #{conts_id}
